## Potato Leaves

<span class="mh">Servings:</span> 2 servings
<br>

<span class="mh">Ingredients:</span>  
<div class="my2cols">
<ul>
  <li>1 TBSP olive oil</li>
  <li>2-3 cloves garlic, sliced</li>
  <li>Ginger (1 tsp ground or 1in fresh, minced)</li>
  <li>8 cups sweet potato leaves</li>
  <li>&frac12; tsp salt or tamari to taste</li>
  <li>&frac12; sesame oil</li>

</ul>
</div>
<br>
<span class="mh">Directions:</span> 
<div class="my2cols">
<ol>
  <li>Heat pan over medium heat</li>
  <li>After heated, add:
    <ul>
      <li>1 TBSP olive oil</li>
      <li>2-3 cloves garlic, sliced</li>
      <li>Ginger (1 tsp ground or 1in fresh, minced)</li>
    </ul> Saute for 1 minute
  </li>
  <li>Add 8 cups of sweet potato leaves and stir until mostly cooked down<br><i>If needed at &frac14; cup water to help cook down</i></li>
  <li>Add:
    <ul>  
      <li>&frac12; tsp salt or tamari to taste</li>
      <li>&frac12; sesame oil</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ol>
</div>


<span class="mh">Notes:</span> Great side-dish if want more veggies, also good with rice. 

<span class="mh">Source:</span> Alex
